item.title: Job Opening - Undergraduate Research Assistant
item.description: Undergraduate Research Assistant Role Description SAVII labs is looking for an Undergraduate Research Assistant to join our team! We need a talented and motivated student who can learn on a variety of different software platforms to assist on a few different projects. A workday might include gathering and analyzing data, creating an electronics diagram in LabView, developing maps in ArcGIS, or creating a 3D BIM model in Revit. This job is a great opportunity to gain hands-on experience in a variety of multi-disciplinary engineering tasks from green building, to microgrids, to data analytics.
